◆ FURI_HAL_I2C_CONFIG_POWER_I2C_TIMINGS_100

#define FURI_HAL_I2C_CONFIG_POWER_I2C_TIMINGS_100   0x10707DBC

Timing register value is computed with the STM32CubeMX Tool, Standard Mode @100kHz with I2CCLK = 64 MHz, rise time = 0ns, fall time = 0ns

Definition at line 12 of file furi_hal_i2c_config.c.

◆ FURI_HAL_I2C_CONFIG_POWER_I2C_TIMINGS_400

#define FURI_HAL_I2C_CONFIG_POWER_I2C_TIMINGS_400   0x00602173

Timing register value is computed with the STM32CubeMX Tool, Fast Mode @400kHz with I2CCLK = 64 MHz, rise time = 0ns, fall time = 0ns

Definition at line 18 of file furi_hal_i2c_config.c.
